body:
The AI although pretty good makes a lot of bad mistakes. Not attacking when it should, blocking when it shouldn't, using enchantments on my creatures that help me.

I think the best way to fix this would be to allow the user to take control of the AI and undo a dumb move by the AI.

We have the back button, however you have to do it 3 or 4 times hoping the AI realizes it was a bad move... Sometimes it will never realize it was a bad move. 

If I could just click on the AI card so It would take the move back that would fix a lot of problems.

Thanks
author: [jgjohn....@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106532616985828525979/)
